page.title: 08Children's Games,Rangeworthy
page.content: {These are some of the games}played by children aged 7 to 11. {At school}we play games like football,cricket, rounders, 123 home and computer games. {When I'm at home,}I play in the swimming pool, on the swings, on my computer and I play outdoor games like non-stop cricket, volleyball, hide and seek and 123 home. {123 home}is a kind of hide and seek. If you see somebody who has been hiding, you run to a post and say 123 and their name. {In non-stop cricket,}there are 2 posts. The bowler bowls at the batter who is standing by a post. The batter hits or kicks the ball away and runs around the posts as many times as possible. If the ball is caught or the ball hits the post, then the batter is out and the next player goes in.
